TEXT.English: [TAB]When tribes met they often traded goods like furs to pottery, fish to deer meat etc. Trading goods eventually led to mutually used currencies.
[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Trade[COLOR_REVERT] allows you to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bazaar[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows you to train [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trade Caravans[COLOR_REVERT].
"He who wants to barter, usually knows what is best for him." - Ethiopian Proverb
TEXT.French: [SPACE]"Celui qui veut faire du troc, sait généralement ce qui est mieux pour lui." - Proverbe Ethiopien
TEXT.Spanish: [SPACE]"Aquel que quiere regatear, suele saber qué le conviene." - Proverbio etiopiano
TEXT.German: [SPACE]"Er, der Tauschhandel betreiben will, weiß für gewöhnlich was am besten für ihn ist." - Ethiopisches Sprichwort
